docs.snippet: The fire at a Florida mansion belonging to a former tennis star was intentionally set and four bodies were found in the charred remains, police said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The fire at a Florida mansion belonging to a former tennis star was intentionally set and four bodies were found in the charred remains, police said Wednesday.

headline.main: Police: Fire at Florida Home Was Arson; 4 Dead
headline.print_headline: Police: Fire at Florida Home Was Arson; 4 Dead

docs.snippet: Leagues have little interest in taking over the day-to-day operation of franchises, but recent history offers examples of how to navigate such a process....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leagues have little interest in taking over the day-to-day operation of franchises, but recent history offers examples of how to navigate such a process.
docs.abstract: Recent history offers a variety of examples in which professional sports leagues have taken over franchises; information could be useful to NBA Commissioner Adam Silver as he prepares to hire an executive to run the Los Angeles Clippers while he begins the process of stripping owner Donald Sterling of his franchise.

headline.main: Examples of How Clippers Could Benefit From League Takeover
headline.print_headline: Examples of How Clippers Could Benefit From League Takeover

docs.snippet: America’s priority should be to maintain the peace without getting too involved....
docs.lead_paragraph: America’s priority should be to maintain the peace without getting too involved.
